target.expr: sum by(pod, container) (changes(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__interval])) > 0

targets.expr:
max by(pod, uid, node, container, name, image, id, instance, restart_policy) (
  # kube-state-metrics sometimes prints different image_spec for the same container ID,
  # which causes errors with duplicate entries.
  # This is probably related to using AdvancedDaemonSet from OpenKruise
  max by(namespace, pod, uid, node, container, name, image, restart_policy) (label_replace((
    # when pod name is the same (for example, for static pods, like kube-apiserver)
    # sometimes kube-state-metrics updates only UID, while still keeping old container_id
    # which leads to many-to-one matching in join queries like this one
    # topk(count_over_time) ensures that we pick metrics that were present for the longest interval
    # container_id!="" is required to skip containers that never started because of failed dependency, like image pull failed or mounted configmap/secret missing
    topk by(namespace, pod, uid, node, container, container_id) (1,
      count_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container", container_id!=""}[$__range])
      or
      count_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container", container_id!=""}[$__range])
    )
  ), "name", "$1", "container_id", "containerd://(.*)")) * 0
  + on(namespace, pod, container, name) group_left(id)
  max by(namespace, pod, container, name, id) (max_over_time(container_start_time_seconds{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__range]))
)

# we need cadvisor instance for cgroup details link
max by(pod, container, name, instance) (
  max without(uid) (max_over_time(container_last_seen{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__range]))
) * 1000

(min by(pod, container, name, instance) (
  timestamp(container_last_seen{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"})
  -
  container_last_seen{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}
  or
  time() - max_over_time(container_last_seen{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__range])
))

min by(pod) (
(
    (max_over_time(kube_pod_status_phase{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Failed"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 2
    or
    (max_over_time(kube_pod_status_phase{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Succeeded"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 3
    or
    (max_over_time(kube_pod_status_phase{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Pending"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 4
    or
    (
        max_over_time(kube_pod_status_phase{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Running"}[$__interval]) == 1
        and on(namespace, pod, uid)
        min_over_time(kube_pod_status_ready{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", condition="true"}[$__interval]) == 1
    ) * 5
    or
    (
        max_over_time(kube_pod_status_phase{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Running"}[$__interval]) == 1
        and on(namespace, pod, uid)
        min_over_time(kube_pod_status_ready{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", condition="true"}[$__interval]) == 0
    ) * 6
    or
    (max_over_time(kube_pod_status_phase{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Unknown"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 7
    or
    # when no condition above satisfied, use this as a fallback
    (max_over_time(kube_pod_status_phase{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Unknown"}[$__interval]) * 0 + 8)
)
* on(namespace, pod, uid) group_left(node)
kube_pod_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}
)

panels.description: Requires a custom recording rule. Empty if containers never restarted.

targets.expr:
max by(uid, container, exit_code, reason, timestamp) (last_over_time(reason:kube_pod_container_status_last_terminated_timestamp{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
* 1000

panels.title: exit statuses

targets.expr:
max by(pod, uid) (
  last_over_time(kube_pod_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__interval])
)
or on() vector(0)

max by(pod, readable_pod_ip) (
  label_replace(
    last_over_time(kube_pod_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__interval])
    , "readable_pod_ip", "$1", "pod_ip", "(.*)"
  )
  or
  # grafana breaks when the only value is empty
  label_replace(
    last_over_time(kube_pod_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__interval])
    , "readable_pod_ip", "-", "invalid", ""
  ) * 0
)
or on() vector(0)

max by(pod, node) (
  last_over_time(kube_pod_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__interval])
)
or on() vector(0)

min by(container) (
    (
        max_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_terminated{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]) == 1
        and
        min_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_last_terminated_exitcode{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]) == 0
    ) * 10
    or
    (
        max_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_terminated{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]) == 1
        and
        min_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_last_terminated_exitcode{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]) != 0
    ) * 11
    or
    (
        max_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_waiting{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]) == 1
        and ignoring(reason)
        max_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_waiting_reason{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container", reason="CrashLoopBackOff"}[$__interval]) == 1
    ) * 20
    or
    (
        max_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_waiting{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]) == 1
        and ignoring(reason)
        max_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_waiting_reason{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container", reason=~"ErrImagePull|ImagePullBackOff"}[$__interval]) == 1
    ) * 21
    or
    (
        max_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_waiting{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]) == 1
    ) * 29
    or
    (
        min_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_ready{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]) == 1
        and
        min_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_running{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]) == 1
    ) * 30
    or
    (
        min_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_ready{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]) == bool 0
        and
        min_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_running{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]) == 1
    ) * 31
    or
    # for some reason I don't see kube_pod_container_status_last_terminated_exitcode on some job containers
    (
        (kube_pod_container_status_terminated{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}) == 1
    ) * 40
)

# group by(container) (
#   max_over_time(kube_pod_status_phase{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Pending"}[$__interval]) == 1
#   or
#   max_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", restart_policy="Always"}[$__interval])
# ) * 0
# +
min by(container) (
    (
        max_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_status_terminated{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]) == 1
        and on(namespace, pod, container)
        max_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_status_terminated_reason{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container", reason="Completed"}[$__interval]) == 1
    ) * 10
    or
    (
        max_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_status_terminated{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__interval]) == 1
        and on(namespace, pod, container)
        count by(namespace, pod, container) (
            max_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_status_terminated_reason{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container", reason!="Completed"}[$__interval]) == 1
        ) > 0
    ) * 11
    or
    (
        max_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_status_waiting{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]) == 1
    ) * 29
    or
    (
        min_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_status_ready{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]) == 1
        and
        min_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_status_running{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]) == 1
    ) * 30
    or
    (
        (min_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_status_ready{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]) == bool 0)
        and
        min_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_status_running{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]) == 1
    ) * 31
    or
    (
        (kube_pod_init_container_status_terminated{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"} == 1)
    ) * 40
)

max by(container, info) (
  label_join(
    count_values without() ("exit_code",
      last_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_last_terminated_exitcode{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__interval])
    )
    * on(location, namespace, pod, uid, container) group_left(reason)
    topk by(location, namespace, pod, uid, container) (1,
      count_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_last_terminated_reason{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__interval])
    )
    , "info", ": ", "exit_code", "reason"
  )
  or
  label_join(
    topk by(location, namespace, pod, uid, container) (1,
      # kube-state-metrics doesn't expose last_terminated_exitcode for init containers
      count_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_status_last_terminated_reason{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__interval])
    )
    , "info", ": ", "reason"
  )
)
or
max by(container, info) (
  label_replace(
    last_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__interval])
    or
    last_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", restart_policy="Always"}[$__interval])
    , "info", "no restarts", "invalid", ""
  )
)
or on() vector(0)

max by(container, readable_container_id) (
  label_replace(
    last_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__interval])
    or
    last_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__interval])
    , "readable_container_id", "$1", "container_id", "containerd://(.*)"
  )
  or
  # grafana breaks when the only value is empty
  label_replace(
    last_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__interval])
    or
    last_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__interval])
    , "readable_container_id", "-", "invalid", ""
  ) * 0
)
or on() vector(0)

max by(container) (max_over_time(container_start_time_seconds{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__interval])) * 1000
or
max by(container) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_state_started{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__interval])) * 1000

max by(container, image_spec) (
  last_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__interval])
  or
  last_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__interval])
)
or on() vector(0)

$__to / 1000 - max by(container) (max_over_time(container_start_time_seconds{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__interval]))
or
$__to / 1000 - max by(container) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_state_started{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]))

sum by(container) (
  rate(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval])
  or
  rate(kube_pod_init_container_status_restarts_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval])
  * on(pod, uid, container) group_left()
  max by(pod, uid, container) (last_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container", restart_policy="Always"}[$__rate_interval]))
) * $__interval_ms / 1000
# sum by(container) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval]))
time() - max by($split_ids) (last_over_time(container_start_time_seconds{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__interval]))
sum by($split_ids) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", cpu="total"}[$__rate_interval]))

avg by($split_ids) (
  (rate(container_cpu_system_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval]))
  /
  sum without(cpu) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", cpu="total"}[$__rate_interval]) + 1e-12)
)

max by(container) (
  avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="cpu", container=~"$container", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__interval])
  or
  avg_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_resource_requests{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="cpu", container=~"$container", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__interval])
)

sum by($split_ids) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", cpu="total"}[$__rate_interval]))
/ on(container) group_left()
avg by(container) (
  avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="cpu", container=~"$container", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__interval]) != 0
  or
  avg_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_resource_requests{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="cpu", container=~"$container", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__interval]) != 0
)

panels.title: cpu (related to limit, empty when limit is not set)

panels.description: empty is cgroup-burst metrics are not configured, of if container doesn't have burst
panels.title: spec: cpu burst

targets.expr:
sum by($split_ids) (
  sum without(cpu) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", cpu="total"}[$__rate_interval]))
  * avg_over_time(container_spec_cpu_period{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval])
  / avg_over_time(container_spec_cpu_quota{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval])
)
or
# when container_spec_cpu_quota is missing
sum by($split_ids) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", cpu="total"}[$__rate_interval]))
/ on(container) group_left()
sum by(container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="cpu",container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by($split_ids) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval]))

avg by($split_ids) (
  + increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval])
  / clamp_min(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval]), 1)
)

panels.description: empty is cgroup-burst metrics are not configured, of if container doesn't have burst

targets.expr:
# if container didn't run at some interval, you will have division by zero, so we do ` / increase + epsilon`
# sometimes burst reporting is slightly misaligned with cadvisor reporting,
# and you get non-zero burst with (zero+epsilon) cfs_periods, which results in unrealistic peak
# using clamp_max fixes this, although overall result can be a bit inaccurate
clamp_max(
  avg by($split_ids) (
    (increase(container_cpu_cgroup_burst_periods_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval]))
    / on(name) group_left()
    clamp_min(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval]), 1)
  )
, 1)

panels.title: CPU burst periods %

panels.description: sum_over_time of seconds spent bursting. Empty is cgroup-burst metrics are not configured, of if container doesn't have burst.

targets.expr: sum by($split_ids) (rate(container_cpu_cgroup_burst_seconds_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval])) * $__interval_ms / 1000

panels.title: CPU burst usage (total time)

options.content:
- `rss` is anon memory
- `wss` = rss + active cache + kernel
- `raw` = `rss` + full cache + kernel
- Cache is active if it used _often_ (more than once?)

What to look for:
- WSS reaching limit causes file garbage collection
- RSS reaching limit causes OOM kill

targets.expr:
max by(container) (
  max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="memory", container=~"$container"}[$__interval])
  or
  max_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_resource_requests{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="memory", container=~"$container"}[$__interval])
)

max by($split_ids) (
  max_over_time(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval])
  # if container is not running but exist in apiserver
  # we still want to show it in limits graph, so we fall back to metrics from ksm
  or on(location, namespace, pod, container)
  (
    max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="memory", container=~"$container"}[$__interval])
    or
    max_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_resource_limits{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="memory", container=~"$container"}[$__interval])
  )
) != 0

avg by($split_ids) (avg_over_time(container_memory_rss{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__interval]))
or
avg by($split_ids) (avg_over_time(container_memory_rss{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: empty if container doesn't have memory request

targets.expr:
(
  avg by($split_ids) (
    + avg_over_time(container_memory_usage_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__interval])
    - avg_over_time(container_memory_cache{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__interval])
  )
  or
  avg by($split_ids) (
    + avg_over_time(container_memory_usage_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval])
    - avg_over_time(container_memory_cache{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval])
  )
)
/ on(container) group_left()
avg by(container) (
  avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="memory", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]) != 0
  or
  max_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_resource_requests{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="memory", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]) != 0
)

panels.title: rss + kernel / request %

targets.expr:
avg by($split_ids) (
  + avg_over_time(container_memory_usage_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__interval])
  - avg_over_time(container_memory_cache{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__interval])
)
or
avg by($split_ids) (
  + avg_over_time(container_memory_usage_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval])
  - avg_over_time(container_memory_cache{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval])
)

panels.description: empty if container doesn't have memory limit

targets.expr:
avg by($split_ids) (
  (
  + avg_over_time(container_memory_usage_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__interval])
  - avg_over_time(container_memory_cache{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__interval])
  )
  / (avg_over_time(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__interval]) != 0)
)
or
avg by($split_ids) (
  (
  + avg_over_time(container_memory_usage_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval])
  - avg_over_time(container_memory_cache{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval])
  )
  / (avg_over_time(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval]) != 0)
)

panels.title: rss + kernel / limit %

targets.expr:
avg by($split_ids) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__interval]))
or
avg by($split_ids) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: empty if container doesn't have memory limit

targets.expr:
avg by($split_ids) (
  + avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__interval])
  / (avg_over_time(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__interval]) != 0)
)
or
avg by($split_ids) (
  + avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval])
  / (avg_over_time(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval]) != 0)
)

panels.title: wss / limit %

targets.expr:
avg by($split_ids) (avg_over_time(container_memory_usage_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__interval]))
or
avg by($split_ids) (avg_over_time(container_memory_usage_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval]))

+ sum by($split_ids) (rate(container_memory_failures_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", failure_type="pgfault"}[$__rate_interval]))
- sum by($split_ids) (rate(container_memory_failures_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", failure_type="pgmajfault"}[$__rate_interval]))

avg by($split_ids) (avg_over_time(container_memory_max_usage_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__interval]))
or
avg by($split_ids) (avg_over_time(container_memory_max_usage_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by($split_ids) (rate(container_memory_failures_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id", failure_type="pgmajfault"}[$__rate_interval]))

avg by($split_ids) (avg_over_time(container_memory_total_active_file_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__interval]))
or
avg by($split_ids) (avg_over_time(container_memory_total_active_file_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(interface) (rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(interface) (rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) * $__interval_ms / 1000
sum by(interface) (rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(interface) (rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) * $__interval_ms / 1000

options.content:
Read/write rate counts only block devices present on the node.

It will be missing NFS and SMB shares, as well as any other
virtual filesystems not backed by a device.

panels.description: volumes can be above actual usage because memory-baked volumes don't use storage but there is no metadata to exclude them here

targets.expr:
max by(pod) (avg_over_time(kube_summary_pod_ephemeral_storage_used_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__interval]))
or
# fall back to ephemeral-storage exporter in case kube-summary is missing
max by(pod) (avg_over_time(ephemeral_storage_pod_usage{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__interval]))
sum by(pod) (max by(pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_summary_container_logs_used_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__interval])))

sum by(pod) (max by(pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_summary_container_rootfs_used_bytes{container=~"$container", location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__interval])))

# this is disabled becasue of issues with memory-baked volumes
+ max by(pod) (avg_over_time(kube_summary_pod_ephemeral_storage_used_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__interval]))
- sum by(pod) (max by(pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_summary_container_logs_used_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__interval])))
- sum by(pod) (max by(pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_summary_container_rootfs_used_bytes{container=~"$container", location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__interval])))
- sum by(pod) (max by(pod, volume_name) (avg_over_time(ephemeral_storage_container_volume_usage{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__interval])))
sum by(pod) (max by(pod, volume_name) (avg_over_time(ephemeral_storage_container_volume_usage{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__interval])))

panels.title: ephemeral storage pod summary

targets.expr: sum by(container) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval]))
max by(container) (avg_over_time(kube_summary_container_rootfs_used_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]))
sum by(container) (rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", name=~"$id"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: empty if pod doesn't have volumes

targets.expr: max by(volume_name) (avg_over_time(ephemeral_storage_container_volume_usage{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__interval]))

panels.title: disk usage: volumes

panels.description: best-effort approximation for volume of written logs; can break in many cases

targets.expr:
sum by(container) (
+ sum by(pod, uid, container) (rate(kube_summary_container_logs_used_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval])) * $__interval_ms / 1000
# when logs are rotated, last 10MiB seems to be kept, so we need to account for this
# this is a best-effort approximation, it's brittle
- (
  0 * (sum by(pod, uid, container) (
    rate(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval])
    or
    rate(kube_pod_init_container_status_restarts_total{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval])
    * on(pod, uid, container) group_left()
    max by(pod, uid, container) (last_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container", restart_policy="Always"}[$__rate_interval]))
  ) != 0)
  or
  sum by(pod, uid, container) (resets(kube_summary_container_logs_used_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval]))
  / on() group_left()
  round(clamp_max(vector($__rate_interval_ms / $__interval_ms), 3))
)
* 1024 * 1024 * 10
)

panels.title: logs: written

targets.expr: max by(container) (avg_over_time(kube_summary_container_logs_used_bytes{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__interval]))

list.definition: query_result(label_replace(label_join(      last_over_time(        namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{location="$location",namespace="$namespace",workload=~"$workload"}[$__range]      )    * on (namespace, pod, uid) group_left ()      max by(namespace, pod, uid) (        last_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_ready{location="$location",namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])      )  * on (namespace, pod, uid) group_left (node)    max by(namespace, pod, uid, node) (      last_over_time(kube_pod_info{location="$location",namespace="$namespace",node=~"$node_selector"}[$__range])    ),  "human_name",  "/",  "node",  "pod"),  "human_name",  "$2 ($1)",  "human_name",  "(.*)/(.*)"))
list.description:
label_replace(
label_join(
      last_over_time(
        namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{location="$location",namespace="$namespace",workload=~"$workload"}[$__range]
      )
    * on (namespace, pod, uid) group_left ()
      max by(namespace, pod, uid) (
        last_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_ready{location="$location",namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])
      )
  * on (namespace, pod, uid) group_left (node)
    max by(namespace, pod, uid, node) (
      last_over_time(kube_pod_info{location="$location",namespace="$namespace",node!=""}[$__range])
    ),
  "human_name",
  "/",
  "node",
  "pod"
),
  "human_name",
  "$2 ($1)",
  "human_name",
  "(.*)/(.*)"
)
list.label: pod
list.name: pod

query.query: query_result(label_replace(label_join(      last_over_time(        namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{location="$location",namespace="$namespace",workload=~"$workload"}[$__range]      )    * on (namespace, pod, uid) group_left ()      max by(namespace, pod, uid) (        last_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_ready{location="$location",namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])      )  * on (namespace, pod, uid) group_left (node)    max by(namespace, pod, uid, node) (      last_over_time(kube_pod_info{location="$location",namespace="$namespace",node=~"$node_selector"}[$__range])    ),  "human_name",  "/",  "node",  "pod"),  "human_name",  "$2 ($1)",  "human_name",  "(.*)/(.*)"))

list.definition: query_result(group by(human_name, container) (  label_replace(    last_over_time(      kube_pod_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__range]    ),    "human_name",    "main/$1",    "container",    "(.*)"  )or  (        (            max_over_time(              kube_pod_status_phase{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", phase="Pending", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__range]            )          ==            1        )      *        0    + on (uid) group_right()      label_replace(        last_over_time(          kube_pod_init_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", restart_policy!="Always"}[$__range]        ),        "human_name",        "init/$1",        "container",        "(.*)"      )  )  or (      label_replace(        last_over_time(          kube_pod_init_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", restart_policy="Always"}[$__range]        ),        "human_name",        "sidecar/$1",        "container",        "(.*)"      )      )))
list.description:
label_replace(last_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__range]), "human_name", "main/$1", "container", "(.*)")
or 
(
  (max_over_time(kube_pod_status_phase{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Pending"}[$__range]) == 1) * 0
  + on(uid) group_right 
label_replace(last_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__range]), "human_name", "init/$1", "container", "(.*)")
)
list.label: container
list.name: container

query.query: query_result(group by(human_name, container) (  label_replace(    last_over_time(      kube_pod_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__range]    ),    "human_name",    "main/$1",    "container",    "(.*)"  )or  (        (            max_over_time(              kube_pod_status_phase{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", phase="Pending", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__range]            )          ==            1        )      *        0    + on (uid) group_right()      label_replace(        last_over_time(          kube_pod_init_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", restart_policy!="Always"}[$__range]        ),        "human_name",        "init/$1",        "container",        "(.*)"      )  )  or (      label_replace(        last_over_time(          kube_pod_init_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", restart_policy="Always"}[$__range]        ),        "human_name",        "sidecar/$1",        "container",        "(.*)"      )      )))

list.definition: query_result(label_replace((last_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__range])or last_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__range])), "name", "$1", "container_id", "containerd://(.*)"))
list.description:
label_replace(
(
last_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__range])
or 
last_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__range])
), "name", "$1", "container_id", "containerd://(.*)")
list.name: container_name

query.query: query_result(label_replace((last_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__range])or last_over_time(kube_pod_init_container_info{location="$location", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", container=~"$container"}[$__range])), "name", "$1", "container_id", "containerd://(.*)"))
